summary.purpose: Main entry point for the akeyless-client-commons library that exports core modules including assets, components, helpers, hooks, and types
summary.problem_solved: Provides a unified namespace for consumers of the library to access all major functionality and modules

internal.why_used: Exports all React components including UI, forms, tables, and utility components
Exports utility functions for API, forms, Firebase, permissions, and more
Exports React hooks for state management and snapshots
Exports TypeScript types, interfaces, enums, and classes used throughout the library

exports.name: assets
exports.description_one_line: Namespace containing asset-related utilities and SVG components

exports.name: components
exports.description_one_line: Namespace containing all React components from the library

exports.name: helpers
exports.description_one_line: Namespace containing utility functions and helpers

exports.name: types
exports.description_one_line: Namespace containing TypeScript types and interfaces

details.what_it_does: Provides access to all asset-related utilities including SVG components and asset helpers

returns.description: Namespace object aggregating the module exports

minimal_correct.title: Access assets module
minimal_correct.code:
import { assets } from 'akeyless-client-commons';
const svg = assets.svg.GreenVSvg();

details.what_it_does: Provides access to all React components including UI components, forms, tables, and utilities

returns.description: Namespace object aggregating the module exports

minimal_correct.title: Access components module
minimal_correct.code:
import { components } from 'akeyless-client-commons';
const { Table, Button, ModularForm } = components;

details.what_it_does: Provides access to utility functions for API calls, form validation, Firebase operations, permissions checking, and more

returns.description: Namespace object aggregating the module exports

minimal_correct.title: Access helpers module
minimal_correct.code:
import { helpers } from 'akeyless-client-commons';
const country = await helpers.getUserCountryByIp();

details.what_it_does: Provides access to React hooks for state management, snapshot subscriptions, and custom React utilities

returns.description: Namespace object aggregating the module exports

minimal_correct.title: Access hooks module
minimal_correct.code:
import { hooks } from 'akeyless-client-commons';
const { useWebWorker, useDbSnapshots } = hooks;

details.what_it_does: Provides access to TypeScript types, interfaces, enums, and classes used throughout the library

returns.description: Namespace object aggregating the module exports

minimal_correct.title: Access types module
minimal_correct.code:
import type { types } from 'akeyless-client-commons';
type Direction = types.Direction;
